column3: â€œSheeeeeeeeeesh. As I got home from the job I took a few hits while I was on the toilet and I thought I fell in the toilet. That pretty much sums up this strain.â€

â€œI must admit, I hadn't smoked in about 2 years possibly more before I tried this amazing strain. I was visiting home (California) from my current state Kentucky.
